producer Cecile Frot-Coutaz says Idol isn't making the mistake of trying to replace Simon Cowell with a facsimile. "You can't, and it would be foolish to try to do that," she says. If you go, "We're going to find another slightly nasty British( recording) executive,' people would reject that because that person would never live up to what Simon Cowell is. That's a recipe for disaster. In our very humble opinion, the only thing you can do is try to create a panel that"s entertaining, likable and credible. 2009. The dispute over Mirafiori is also part of a wider struggle by the outspoken Sergio Marchionne to bring about radical reforms in Italian industry. "What I hope is that Kelsey Grammer and I can improve our communications and truly co-parent our two wonderful children," her statement said. She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh , love and happiness in their new marriage. Kelsey Grammer , 55, told David Letterman on his show last month that he plans to marry Kayte Walsh sometime in February. The veteran actor starred in the comedy series "Cheers" and "Frasier."
